title: Aural set, Easy Winners - phrase diagram

content.description:
You will hear an excerpt from a piano work that can be diagrammed as follows:

Introduction ||: 4 phrases :||

First the introduction will be played once. Then the entire excerpt will be played twice. Before listening to the introduction, please read the questions.
content.question: The four phrases are best labeled as

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
